ph: The best is yet to come.
author: Charlotte Brontë

ph: Do what you love.

ph: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

ph: Prove them wrong.
author: Wayne Gretzky

ph: Life is what we make of it.

ph: You are your only limit.

ph: Do it with passion or not at all.

ph: We become what we think about.
author: Earl Nightingale

ph: Life is what we make of it.
author: Fernando Pessoa

ph: An unexamined life is not worth living.

ph: Eighty percent of success is showing up.

ph: Start somewhere.

ph: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.

ph: Conquer from within.

ph: Every moment is a fresh beginning.

ph: We’re all mad here.
author: Lewis Carroll

ph: I would always rather be happy than dignified.
author: Charlotte Brontë

ph: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.

ph: The only joy in the world is to begin.

ph: Never regret anything that made you smile.

ph: The best revenge is massive success.

ph: If you can dream it, you can do it.

ph: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
author: Aristotle

ph: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

ph: If you want to be happy, be.

ph: Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.

ph: All we have is now.

ph: I am not young enough to know everything.

ph: My life is my message.

ph: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

ph: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.

ph: Fun is a serious thing.

ph: Whatever you do, do it well.

ph: Say less, do more.

ph: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.

ph: With great power comes great responsibility.

ph: Silence is an answer too.

ph: All limitations are self-imposed.

ph: Whatever you are, be a good one.

ph: There is no substitute for hard work.

ph: If you’re going through hell, keep going.

ph: Everything you can imagine is real.

ph: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.

ph: You become what you believe.

ph: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.

ph: Save me from my mind

ph: If I can’t dance to it, it’s not my revolution.
